extendedInfo.description: The Official First UK Bus AppMake bus travel even easier with our official First Bus App.Our brand new App helps you plan your journeys, providing ânext busâ times for all bus services throughout Great Britain, including real time info where available. Alongside information about First Bus services, features include; route maps showing the location of bus stops, timetables, details of our tickets and fares and service updates.You can even save your favourite stops so you can check times at a glance. So install it now for free, and get on board with First.Our features in full:â¢ Search by service number or destination in âGB Busâ and find live or scheduled bus times for over 300,000 bus stops across Great Britain (see notes)â¢ Look up route maps for all bus services in Great Britain (see notes)â¢ The ability to save your favourite bus stop so you can quickly check the time of your next busâ¢ Create a personal timetable to suit your journey by departure and arrival times, route, direction of travel, day of the week and even the time of day between two locations on any First Bus routeâ¢ Up to date news and information about First Bus servicesâ¢ Details of ticket types and fares available on First Bus networksâ¢ Contact details for First customer services with links to Twitter and Facebook sites where availableNotes:Next Bus and Route Maps features use data supplied by Traveline. We always try to provide as accurate and detailed route and service information as we possibly can but sometimes this can be affected by the data available to us. If you notice anything missing, or would like to suggest an improvement, please let us know using the link; https://response.questback.com/firstgroupplc/cp0mrjktee/To see a full list of the areas where live real time, next bus information is available please visit; http://www.firstgroup.com/ukbus/assets/pdfs/app/realtime.pdfRoute maps:The red line representing the route between bus stops is generated automatically and may occasionally deviate from the actual route taken. As routing technology improves weâll provide updates.Troubleshooting:Before reporting errors we would recommend you uninstall and reinstall the App. As with most general IT problems, turning it âon and off againâ can cure most general issues. If this doesnât work, please contact us; weâll be happy to help.To report an issue with your app, please visit; https://response.questback.com/firstgroupplc/cp0mrjktee/

reviews.title: Forget it if you\'re in Bristol
reviews.comment: Used to work ok, but since they took off most the buses in Bristol not worked. The county council maybe voting no confidence in the company I\'m voting no confidence in the app.
reviews.author: Jason Wakeham

reviews.title: Was good until....
reviews.comment: This week, now half the Aberdeen services are missing including the no.3 which I use so app is currently useless
reviews.author: Alison Reid

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Content not up-to-date, gives incorrect times and times for services that don\'t exist.
reviews.author: Chris Marsden

reviews.title: Needs major improvement
reviews.comment: When looking for real time information on bus arrivals, nine times out of ten a notice comes up saying \"sorry we are having problems connecting to the server,please try again in a few moments\". Needless to say, the notice comes up again and again. Ok for general information on bus services but it could be so much better.
reviews.author: Peter Kendall

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Its good to have an app that works so well especially if your in a rush to get to work or late for the school run, easy to use simple and clear instructions,good job on this app makes my life that little bit easier ! :-)
reviews.author: Paul bidmead

reviews.title: Good when it works, which is rare.
reviews.comment: On the (very) rare occasion that the app works, it\'s good. However when requesting details of the next bus to arrive at a stop, 95% of the time the app responds with \"Error connecting to server. Please try again in a few moments\" despite the phone having full high speed internet signal. First - buy a server that works! It can\'t be that hard. Also, the app frequently force closes if a GPS position can\'t be found.
reviews.author: Carlos Donald-Lopez

reviews.title: Useful when it works
reviews.comment: This app would be great if it actually worked more than 10% of the time. Useful little ideas, especially nearby stops and next bus but the app crashes a lot and occasionally just won\'t load information. Usually when you most need it. It\'s a lot like first buses. Good when they\'re there, but unfortunately they\'re usually not.
reviews.author: Alfie Strickland

reviews.title: Now very good!
reviews.comment: This app used to be as useful as 2 right shoes but now its been updated its brilliant!
reviews.author: Lewis Rydon

reviews.title: Useful but buggy
reviews.comment: It\'s useful to tell when\'s the next bus. However, on small devices, icons overlaps.
reviews.author: Thu Win

reviews.title: Frequent problems
reviews.comment: Useful when it works but usually reports \'API request failed\' when trying to view real time info.
reviews.author: John Wallace

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Waste of time do not bother unless you want to have to keep reinstalling it just to get times.
reviews.author: Teddy Jenkins

reviews.title: Very poor app!
reviews.comment: Cannot get infomation on certain bus routes, needs work.
reviews.author: James Boldock

reviews.title: Terrible app since last update
reviews.comment: Used to be a good app until the last update, now its useless. Can not connect to server API fault comes up each time you try to get live bus info.
reviews.author: Dave Roberts

reviews.title: Whats the point
reviews.comment: The app is just as good as the bus company never arrives on time and when you need it the most it chooses not to work complete waste of time
reviews.author: Paula sandell

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Every time I use it it crashes  and sone times I just want to see a full time table for a bus not isolated times
reviews.author: Joshua Wilson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show any bus times just keeps saying there\'s a problem with the server
reviews.author: Billie-jean Davis

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Suddenly most of the buses in leeds has disappeared and it keeps crashing
reviews.author: Rosie Jacobs

reviews.title: Could be good - if it worked
reviews.comment: This app frequently fails with timeout. Many of routes are only partially marked on the map and the ones which are marked are not terribly accurate.
reviews.author: Louise Chetwynd

reviews.title: A lot of services missing
reviews.comment: No timetable information for most of the Leeds buses. Pointless app!
reviews.author: Natalie Stevens

reviews.title: Actually a good app
reviews.comment: Shame about the appalling service though
reviews.author: Gerry White
